Title: All Ore Nothing
Description:
Outlander. Your aid is requested. 

The earthen here have said you would be of help. 

Our fellow earthen at the Opalcreg have not reported their quota for the past day. There must be something causing a disruption.  

Would you pay Foreman Alvegar a visit?
ObjectivesText: Go to the Opalcreg and seek out Alvegar.
RewardText:
I'm hiding... lay low. 

Foreman Germira sent you? She must be worried that we haven't sent over our quota.
